Type.BattleDialog: Alright~ I’ll show you how sharp a cat’s claws are!
Hey, we’re being met with pretty passionate cheers?
Oink, MuMu! Ready to perform?
That was a pretty satisfying performance~
I don’t think these will make any pretty sounds even if we tried playing them?
Aah… This is it. The exact sound… I’ve been looking for…
It stings to lose my bandmates.
Don’t feel so bad. You created your best music in your last moments!
I was hoping for a more charming sound…
Did you just hear that? That made a sound that made me go “This is it!”
Haha! You’re full of different tunes!
Fly like a rabbit, sting like a bee~
Those guys look like they’ll make unusual sounds, huh?
Ready when you are~ Okay, time for a bit of creative exercise.
That wasn’t a perfect harmony, but~ It had its own personality.
Huu-cha. Today’s performance was a success~
That’s the sound… You guys heard it too, right? The melody that penetrates me…
Thanks for being passionate about making music until the end.
I’ll say your last sound was pretty soft.
This isn’t it, either… I just can’t seem to recreate that sound.
Ah, that sounded pretty alright, I think~?
Heehaw was a big fan of this kind of sound.
Can we really perform more later…
MuMu and Meow cheered me up… I can do it.
I’m ready. Can we start right away?
Now we can go to the supermarket, my favorite place.
Didn’t I do okay this performance?
I finally nailed it… In my dying breath…
…I didn’t want to hear the last performance of a fellow musician.
We won’t be able to perform together anymore…
What if I added a bit more… bone-grinding noises to that sound?
Hmm… This technique won’t cut it.
Be honored that you can be an instrument for making beautiful sounds.
